#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

long long b[] =
	{ 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 16384,
32768, 65536, 131072, 262144, 524288 };

int main(void)
{
	int T;
	int dec, i, j, N;
	int bin[1000], gray[1000];

	scanf("%d", &T);

	while (T--)
	{
		scanf("%d", &dec);
		i = 0;

		while (dec > 0)
		{
			bin[i++] = dec % 2;
			dec /= 2;
		}

		i = i - 1;
		N = i;
		gray[i] = bin[i];
		j = i;
		i = i - 1;

		while (i >= 0)
		{
			if (bin[i] == gray[j])
			{
				gray[i] = 0;
			}
			else
			{
				gray[i] = 1;
			}
			i--;
			j--;
		}

		dec = 0;

		while (N >= 0)
		{
			if (gray[N] == 1)
			{
				dec += b[N];
			}
			N--;
		}

		printf("%d\n", dec);
	}

	return 0;
}
